import React from 'react' import api from '../utils/Api.js' function Main(props){ let userName let userDescription let userAvatar let UserInfo React.useEffect(() => { Promise.all(api.getUserFromServer()) .then((res) => { UserInfo = res }).catch((err) => console.error(err)) } ) console.log(UserInfo) return (

{userName}

) } export default Main
